title: Big Time Rush In Real Life Worldwide Tour: How to Get Tickets
description: The band will hit the road in summer 2025 and perform songs from the Nickelodeon show. Learn how to get tickets here. Big Time Rush In Real Life Worldwide Tour: How to Get Tickets Mary Siroky
author: Mary Siroky
excerpt: Big Time Rush are hitting the road in 2025 for a tour specifically dedicated to playing every song from their Nickelodeon series. Learn how to get tickets
text: The members of Big Time Rush are bringing the nostalgia to the road in 2025. The “In Real Life Worldwide Tour” is set to see Kendall, James, Logan, and Carlos performing every song from the Nickelodeon television show that introduced the band to the world. Get Big Time Rush Tickets Here Find details on the tour, including how to get tickets here, pre-sale info, a full list of dates, and more. The band will kick off the “In Real Life Worldwide Tour” in Birmingham in July. The extensive US run will stretch through August; Big Time Rush will then head to Europe, with the tour set to conclude in Athens, Greece in December. The “In Real Life” tour follows through on a longtime fan request from the most dedicated of fans, seeing the band play through every song from every episode of their television show, which ran for four seasons from 2009 to 2013. The set list will include tracks like “Boyfriend,” “Worldwide,” and the show’s theme song, “Big Time Rush.” “Rushers will finally get to revisit their favorite moments from the show, plus many more surprises,” promises a statement about the tour. The band is celebrating the tour announcement with a free Los Angeles pop-up event set for March 1st and 2nd at MG Studios (1319 West 11th Street). How Can I Buy Tickets to the 2025 Big Time Rush Tour? Members of the Big Time Rush fan club will have first access to tickets. Digital membership is $50, and includes the opportunity to purchase a variety of VIP packages that feature meet and greets, access to a Palm Woods themed lounge, and a pre-show huddle with the band. Fan club pre-sale will begin for dates in the US on Ticketmaster on Tuesday, February 25th at 10:00 a.m. local time. A social pre-sale is set for the following day, Wednesday, February 26th at 10:00 a.m. local time, while a Live Nation pre-sale is taking place on Thursday, February 27th at 10:00 a.m. local time (use code DUET). Tickets in the US will then become available to the general public via Ticketmaster on Friday, February 28th at 10:00 a.m. local time. Mastercard cardholders in Italy, France, Belgium and Netherlands will have special access to a Ticketmaster pre-sale taking place on Wednesday, February 26th at 10:00 a.m. local time. The general on-sale for Europe and the UK is also set for Friday, February 28th at 10:00 a.m. local time. Once tickets are on sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand. Who Is Opening for Big Time Rush? While official openers haven’t yet been announced, the members of the band will be joined by Katelyn Tarver and Stephen Kramer Glickman, who played Jo and Gustavo on the Nickelodeon show. What Are Big Time Rush’s 2025 Tour Dates? See the full list of 2025 tour dates below, and grab tickets here. Big Time Rush 2025 Tour Dates: 07/09 — Birmingham, AL @ Coca-Cola Amphitheater 07/11 — Nashville, TN @ Ascend Amphitheater 07/12 — Alpharetta, GA @ Ameris Bank Amphitheatre 07/13 — Tampa, FL @ html:
The members of Big Time Rush are bringing the nostalgia to the road in 2025. The “In Real Life Worldwide Tour” is set to see Kendall, James, Logan, and Carlos performing every song from the Nickelodeon television show that introduced the band to the world.

Get Big Time Rush Tickets Here

Find details on the tour, including how to get tickets here, pre-sale info, a full list of dates, and more.

The band will kick off the “In Real Life Worldwide Tour” in Birmingham in July. The extensive US run will stretch through August; Big Time Rush will then head to Europe, with the tour set to conclude in Athens, Greece in December.

The “In Real Life” tour follows through on a longtime fan request from the most dedicated of fans, seeing the band play through every song from every episode of their television show, which ran for four seasons from 2009 to 2013. The set list will include tracks like “Boyfriend,” “Worldwide,” and the show’s theme song, “Big Time Rush.” “Rushers will finally get to revisit their favorite moments from the show, plus many more surprises,” promises a statement about the tour.

The band is celebrating the tour announcement with a free Los Angeles pop-up event set for March 1st and 2nd at MG Studios (1319 West 11th Street).

How Can I Buy Tickets to the 2025 Big Time Rush Tour?

Members of the Big Time Rush fan club will have first access to tickets. Digital membership is $50, and includes the opportunity to purchase a variety of VIP packages that feature meet and greets, access to a Palm Woods themed lounge, and a pre-show huddle with the band. Fan club pre-sale will begin for dates in the US on Ticketmaster on Tuesday, February 25th at 10:00 a.m. local time. A social pre-sale is set for the following day, Wednesday, February 26th at 10:00 a.m. local time, while a Live Nation pre-sale is taking place on Thursday, February 27th at 10:00 a.m. local time (use code DUET).

Tickets in the US will then become available to the general public via Ticketmaster on Friday, February 28th at 10:00 a.m. local time.

Mastercard cardholders in Italy, France, Belgium and Netherlands will have special access to a Ticketmaster pre-sale taking place on Wednesday, February 26th at 10:00 a.m. local time. The general on-sale for Europe and the UK is also set for Friday, February 28th at 10:00 a.m. local time.

Once tickets are on sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

Who Is Opening for Big Time Rush?

While official openers haven’t yet been announced, the members of the band will be joined by Katelyn Tarver and Stephen Kramer Glickman, who played Jo and Gustavo on the Nickelodeon show.

What Are Big Time Rush’s 2025 Tour Dates?

See the full list of 2025 tour dates below, and grab tickets here.
